animeTitle: Dirty Pair no Ooshoubu: Nolandia no Nazo
animeDescription: The Dirty Pair are traveling to the planet of Ookbar in search of a missing girl. Kei and Yuri have traced Missinie to the forest of Nolandia, but their investigations have stalled thanks to the less-than-helpful Chief of Security. But the Dirty Pair have never let a little bureaucracy stand in their way.  (Source: AniDB)
animeVoices: ['Tonguu, Kyouko', 'Shimazu, Saeko', 'Makishima, Naoki', 'Ikeda, Masaru', 'Han, Keiko', 'Ginga, Banjou', 'Fujita, Toshiko']
